Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the manufacturer disclosure and transparency act
Summary: Enacts the manufacturer disclosure and transparency act requiring prescription drug manufacturers to notify the attorney general of arrangements between pharmaceutical manufacturers resulting in the delay of the introduction of generic medications.
LawCode: Add ยง396-rrr, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring prescription drug manufacturers to notify the attorney general of arrangements between pharmaceutical manufacturers resulting in the delay of the introduction of generic drugs
